thread.section_title: Saint James Albany Hotel-Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Romantic weekend in Paris
thread.title_full: Romantic weekend in Paris - Review of Saint James Albany Hotel-Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Giulia B
title: Romantic weekend in Paris
text:
I went to Paris with my boyfriend for a romantic weekend. This hotel was the best choice. It's a historical building with a touch of modernity inside (ex spa, garden setting). We took a superior room and it was very big and perfectly cleaned. The bathroom was really nice and full of Occitane products (very good smell). The position is great, city center. We didn't try the breakfast of the hotel tough.
The concierge and the receptionist were all very nice (exept of the blond girl with red glasses very unpolite only because we left our key in the morning).
We will book again this hotel for our parisian visits!
